content:
cc #79557

_ is currently not allowed as a const argument and always parsed as a type. While we probably want to change this in the near future it's probably a good idea to at least add a note which explains this to the error message
@Pedro Mendes @Ethan Brierley @Hameer Abbasi is one of you interested in working on this?
I would like to work on that.
:thumbs_up: tell me whenever you need help on this. It isn't completely trivial without any mentoring instructions
